name: Red Colony 3 Uncensored
description:
The Red Colony series doesn’t take itself too seriously. The first game is set on a communist version of Mars, the second is based on a Jurassic Park gone even more wrong than the movie - and the third, well you’ll have to play to find out.

Story



It’s here, the final chapter in a series that has taken you across the solar system and had you battle it out against zombies, perverts, dinosaurs and now even ROBOTS!

Red Colony 3 Uncensored picks up directly after the events in Red Colony 2 Uncensored. You play as Mina, a sexy big bosomed android, who is returning to her home planet of Titan with the precious dinosaur DNA, desired by her Queen.

Her mission complete, Mina looks forward to her long awaited reward- to be ‘Turned’. Finally after years of servitude, she will gain her own free will, live the life she wants and at last learn what it means to love.

However, her dreams come to a screeching halt when a stowaway aboard her ship causes an uprising on Titan, which Mina is blamed for. Not only that - dinosaurs were not the only thing Mina brought back with her from Mars. . .




Help Mina fight zombies, dinosaurs and mutagenic monsters in the classic Red Colony, edge of your seat fashion. Scour the environment for clues to unlock tricky puzzles and follow the twisting, whacky story to its climatic conclusion when Red Colony 3 Uncensored launches very soon on Steam!

Features



- Fantastic anime character design.
- A twisted, gruesome and unfair story.
- Good-old-fashioned bloody, gory horror!
- Patent-pending ;) 2DTCT (2D Tear-Clothes-Technology).
- A Graphic Novel style narrative with classic Survival Horror gameplay.
- Multiple sexy outfits for Mina.
- Nudity and steamy content not allowed on other gaming platforms.

FAQ

Can I use keyboard and mouse to play the game?


Yes- you can use the keyboard to move around and interact within the game. However, the game is designed for a gamepad and we suggest you play it with one.

What are the differences between this version and the Switch version?


Steam Achievements
Nudity/ Nude Mode and Uncensored content
Better lighting and particle effects

How many endings are there?


There are two endings to Red Colony 3 Uncensored.

What is the ‘Uncensored’ content?


That the player can play in Nude Mode as Mina and can see the NPC characters’ breasts.

Do I have to play the Red Colony games in order?


Not really. They work in any order.
